content.description: Mini jug on far west side and sloper on south or main face. Sit start is maybe v3 if you're short enough other wise starting crossed on the far west side will work.  Then traverse the spine on whats good and top out on the far east side.
content.protection: 2 large pads will cover the whole landing
content.location: It is to the east of the trail heading back from the main trail that leads out from the neighborhoods

content.description: Start matched on the dark inclusion with a beautiful ledge. Find a low cristal for one foot,  then a heel hook to the left allows you to rock over onto the slab. Walk the rest of the way up. A bit of a one move problem but with such a nice handhold it’s a welcome break from the usual skin destroying granite.
content.location: North East side of the border behind Ordnance proper. Walk from Ordnance’s steep face around to the left till you see a dark inclusion with a good edge on it. That’s your start hold.

content.description: Start on the rightmost flake and head east to the opposite spine and lay your way back up to the top.
start on the rightmost flake and move left to the undercling and dyno from that and the crimps to the top
content.protection: 2 large pads cover whole landing area

content.description: A half split boulder right off the trail that it noted by the dynamite marks along it's sweet spine
